mapper.insert: insert into schedule(SCH_TITLE, SCH_START, SCH_END, SCH_ALL, SCH_ATTEND, SCH_EXTATTEND, SCH_PLACE, SCH_CONTENT, SCH_MYCAL, SCH_RESERV) values(#{schTitle}, #{schStart}, #{schEnd}, #{schAll , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schAttend , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schExtAttend}, #{schPlace}, #{schContent}, #{schMyCal , jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schReserv , jdbcType=VARCHAR})
